climbs.name: Up The Junction
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 14th August 2008

content.description:
Start up the left facing corner and clip the first bolt.    Continue directly up to join

Slap and Tickle

at the 2nd bolt.  Continue to a tricky sequence that gains the large shelf.

Continue up the slab to the last bolt. Passing the last bolt is the crux, but with some good slab technique the anchors are soon reached.

Slap and Tickle

,

Up The Junction

and

Cool For Cats

all share the same anchors.
content.location: Center corner of the squeeze section

climbs.name: Time For Tea
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 17th August 2009

content.description:
Start directly below the rounded arete, and continue up the arete with a mixture of face moves and laybacking on the arete.

At the top of the arete, clip the directional bolt and head right to the back of the bay and the anchors.

climbs.name: Slap and Tickle
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 14th August 2008

content.description:
Start 5 feet left of the left facing corner taken by

Up The Junction

.   Climb the fun flakes and dikes to a tricky sequence to gain the large shelf.

Continue up the slab to the last bolt.   Passing the last bolt is the crux, but with some good slab technique the anchors are soon reached.

Slap and Tickle

,

Up The Junction

and

Cool For Cats

all share the same anchors.
content.location: Middle of the right section of the cliff - this is the left climb in the 'Squeeze Section'

climbs.name: The Quickening
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 12th August 2008

content.description:
A deceptively steep climb which proves to be harder than it looks.

Move up to good ledge and reach up to a good ledge in order to clip the first bolt.   Move up onto the ledge and fight the desire to fall off backwards.

Clip the second and then make the crux moves to gain the slab above.   Once established on the slab continue easily passing the 3rd bolt up to the anchors.
content.location:
This climb is situated 15 feet right of

The Gathering

.

climbs.name: On the Count of Three
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron, Alex Cameron, Julie Wright, Michael Cameron, 17th August 2009

content.description:
Start up the left side of the slab, passing the first bolt to the ledge.   From the ledge continue up the slab with some good thin slab moves until the 4th bolt.

Mantle up onto the top of the slab and then continue up to the anchors (slightly right - shared with

Fun-gi

).
content.location: Located on the left side of the slab at the right of the wall.

content.description:
Climb the slab to the small overlap and the first bolt.   Step up onto the slab above and follow the good line of holds up the seam, passing the second bolt.

At the top of the slab move into the bay and the anchors, located on the wall at the back (shared with

Time For Tea

).
content.location:
Located on the recessed slab between

Time For Tea

, and

On the Count of Three

.

climbs.name: Kilt Lifter
climbs.fa: Chris Miller, September 2008; First Lead Euan Cameron, 19th August 2012

content.description:
Start left of

Slap and Tickle

in a left-facing corner and climb a slabby ramp to a vertical headwall with several under-clings. Work up the headwall to a devious crux section and mantle onto the ledge just left of Slap & Tickle and then wander up low-angled slab to finish on a short section of off-vertical face just left of Slap & Tickle's finish.
content.location:
Located 10 feet left of

Slap and Tickle

.

climbs.name: Immortal
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 14th August 2008

content.description:
Move up the easy slab start to reach the steeper cracks.   Pass the second bolt with some tricky moves up and onto the large ledge in the corner.

Clip the 3rd bolt, and then move out left and follow the prominent foot ledge and quartz vein for hands.   At the arete clip the 4th bolt and move directly up to finish at the anchors of

The Gathering

.
content.location:
Start just right of

The Gathering

.

climbs.name: Highlander
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 14th August 2008

content.description:
Start left of the arete and climb up easily to clip the 1st bolt.  Move past this and clip the 2nd bolt and then make thin moves up the steep wall to a rounded mantelshelf and the 3rd bolt.

Finish with a final mantle to reach the anchors.
content.location: Left side of the central arete

climbs.name: The Gathering
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 12th August 2008

content.description:
This climbs the striking central arete and overhang in the middle of the cliff.

Start on the arete, and make a balancy sequence of moves passed the 1st bolt and up to the 2nd bolt.

Continue directly up the arete to the overhang and make a hard sequence of moves to gain better holds in the groove above the overhang. Clip the 3rd bolt and continue directly to the anchors.

climbs.name: Fun-gi
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron, Michael Cameron, Alex Cameron, Julie Wright, 17th August 2009

content.description:
Start up the slab to the first bolt, then  continue up to a small overlap and the 2nd bolt.   Make a tricky move over the overlap, and continue more easily up to the 3rd bolt.

Finish directly up to the anchors (shared with

On the Count of Three

)
content.location: Right side of slab on the right hand end of the wall.

climbs.name: Cool For Cats
climbs.fa: Euan Cameron and Julie Wright, 14th August 2008

content.description:
Start up the slab and follow its left edge passing 3 bolts with the crux passing the 3rd.

Continue up to the 4th bolt and then onto the slab and up to the finishing slab finish.

Slap and Tickle

,

Up The Junction

and

Cool For Cats

all share the same anchors.
content.location: Right polished slab of the Squeeze section
